dcterms:description: The TREC question dataset involves classifying a question sentence into six types, with a total of 5,452 training samples and 500 testing samples. 10% of the training data was randomly held out for validation.
dcterms:title: TREC question dataset

dcterms:description: SST-1 contains one sentence movie reviews which are rated in the scale of 1-5 going from positive to negative. The dataset has a predefined train-test-dev split with 8,544 training samples, 2,210 testing samples, and 1,101 validation samples.
dcterms:title: SST-1

dcterms:description: SST-2 is a binary version of SST-1 where there are only two labels positive and negative. It has 6,920 training samples, 1,821 testing samples, and 872 validation samples.
dcterms:title: SST-2

dcterms:description: The original English versions of the SST-1 and SST-2 datasets were translated to Hindi using Google Translate.
dcterms:title: Translated versions of SST-1 and SST-2
